LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.label: Dogge
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.description: A four-legged robot dog which excels at providing forward reconnaissance and urban combat support during operations. It can equipped with small-caliber firearms or flamethrowers to provide offensive capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Dogge.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.label: Lady
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.description: The MG-1 Lady is a mech that makes use of synthetic mechanical technology. It was originally designed to reduce the cognitive bias syndrome caused by long-term cooperation with machines in the military. Much of its anatomical structures is similar to a humans, and its internal parts can almost be directly transplanted into a human body. Due to its overly human appearance, it was primarily used as a sniper's observer or an officer's bodyguard.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.tools.left_fist-0.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.tools.right_fist-0.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.tools.left_fist-1.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Lady.tools.right_fist-1.label: right fist
